about_the_game:
Roasting tortoise shell under the star-ribboned sky or in the darkling vaults of Qud can get lonely. Thankfully, Pets of Harvest Dawn offers thirteen unique companions to keep you company. From the loyal bark of Hylaeus, to the swooning proclamations of E-Ros, to the terrifying astral gaze of Gloaming, you uttering "live and drink" will never go unanswered again.

Whenever you start a new game, choose one of these 13 pets to accompany you. Some are combat-oriented, some have special utility powers. Some are just a pleasure to talk to.

Get to know the Pets of Harvest Dawn

E-Ros — They WILL compare you to a summer's day.

Ebenshabat —  A waydroid farmer who loves starapples.

either / or — "A pair of rhythmic shades who perform the subtext of all your affairs..."

Ercolano — A... rocking chair?

Esbear — What if a bear had psychic powers?

Frondzie — A sentient vine who cannot stop crackin' wise.

Gloaming — This owl is not what it seems.

Herman — Definitely a human. Not a clew of worms animating a corpse.

Hylaeus — An Ibulian dog down on his luck. Can you help him turn it around?

Iopinax the Younger — The descendant of legendary three-headed got-goat Iopinax of Athenreach

Lyy — A dream frog come to life from an ink illustration.

Man Opener — Cuddly beetle. Opener of men.

Uthabatafah — Little hoof. Big heart.
